item.title: Certifications - Offensive Security Certified Professional
item.description: Offensive Security Certified Professional (OSCP) is an ethical hacking certification offered by Offensive Security that teaches penetration testing methodologies and the use of the tools included with the Kali Linux distribution (successor of BackTrack). The OSCP is a hands-on penetration testing certification, requiring holders to successfully attack and penetrate various live machines in a safe lab environment. After a 1 month lab access, I aquired my OSCP certificate with my first try.
